eligibility.additionalValue: Applications are for individuals and personal use purposes only

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applications for credit cards are subject to credit approval.

features.additionalInfo: Pay with your Apple(TM) device using Apple Pay.
Wherever you are in the world, Great Southern Bank gives you the choice and control to securely manage all of your accounts on a range of devices, the way you want.
Pay with your NFC capable Android devices using Google Pay

Additional Cardholders must be over 16 years of age. If an Additional Cardholder is not an existing Great Southern Bank customer, they must complete a Membership Application - Individual form and satisfy our identification requirements before being added to your account.
Up to 55 interest free days on purchases when you pay off your closing balance in full by the due date shown on your statement each month.

Your minimum repayment for each month will be calculated as the amount that is the greatest (or equal greatest) of: • $35; or • 3% of your Closing Balance; AND • your Overlimit Amount (if any). If the Closing Balance on your Account is less than $35, the minimum repayment will be the Closing Balance.

fees.name: Disputed Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A Disputed Transaction Fee will be charged where a Transaction you dispute is resolved in the favour of the merchant.

fees.name: Foreign Exchange Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A Foreign Exchange Fee will be charged in Australian dollars for any Purchases or Cash Advances made or processed in a foreign currency or where the merchant, or the merchant’s financial institution, is located overseas (both Multi-Currency Transactions and Single Currency Transactions).

fees.name: Overseas Replacement Card Fee
fees.additionalInfo: An Overseas Replacement Card Fee will be charged when a replacement Card is provided to you or an Additional Cardholder overseas (including in emergencies).

fees.name: Account Information Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Unless we are legally obliged to provide the information free of charge, an Account Information Fee will be payable when you request the following: (a) An annual audit certificate on the Account (b) A copy of a voucher or other document in relation to a Transaction (c) Personal Information, traces, document copies and/or other information pertaining to the Account where further investigation is required an additional hourly rate of $20 per hour or part thereof will apply. An estimate of such additional charges will be provided prior to the work being undertaken.

fees.name: Late Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A Late Payment Fee will be charged if the ”Total amount due” figure shown on the Statement is not paid within 25 days from your Statement Date.

fees.name: Annual Card fee
fees.additionalInfo: There is no Annual Fee payable for the first year after you enter into your Agreement. An Annual Fee will be charged to your Account on the statement after the first anniversary of you entering into the Agreement and then will be charged annually thereafter.

discounts.description: No Annual Fee payable for the first year

eligibility.additionalInfo: $0 annual fee for the first year

fees.name: Arrears Letter Fee
fees.additionalInfo: An Arrears Letter Fee will be charged when Great Southern Bank sends you a letter in relation to any amount owing on your Account.

fees.name: Cash Advance Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A minimum of $3.50 Cash Advance Fee will be charged when a Cash Advance is obtained from your Account.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A Default Notice Fee will be charged when Great Southern Bank sends you a default notice in relation to any amount owing on your Account.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: This offer is available for approved applicants when they apply for a new Credit Card from 25 November 2021. This is a limited time only offer which may be withdrawn or changed at any time without notice. Offer not available to transfers from credit cards that you already have with us. Only one application per account accepted (consolidate up to  3 credit cards per application). The balance transfer application must be applied for within three months of the Disclosure Date in your Offer and Card Contract. Your total balance transfer may not exceed 80% of your credit limit. We may allow this to be exceeded at our discretion. The Promotional Interest Rate Period of 0% p.a. will apply for 33 months from the date the balance transfer application is processed. At the end of the Promotional Interest Rate Period, the Cash Advance rate (currently 21.74%p.a. as at 1 June 2021, subject to change) will apply to any part of the balance transfer which remains unpaid. The 55 days interest free period on purchases will not apply while any balance transfer amount remains outstanding. This means that all purchases will be charged interest at the applicable annual percentage rate.
